title: President summons NA, Senate sessions
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 11 (APP):President Asif Ali Zardari has summoned sessions of the National Assembly and Senate, scheduled for Monday, January 13, and Tuesday, January 14, respectively.
The National Assembly session will commence at 5:00 PM, while the Senate session is set to begin at 4:00 PM.
The president summoned the sessions of the National Assembly and the Senate in the exercise of the powers conferred by Article 54(1) of the Constitution of the country.
